#summary Identifies the user interfaces associated with SitesWrapper.

= User Interfaces =

From an overall distributed product perspective, SitesWrapper provides the following user interfaces.
  # *Server Service Wrapper* HTML only web page based end user interface
  # *Client Wrapper* AJAX style web page based end user interface
  # *Android Configuration Client* provides an Android app preferences API style end user interface thatâ€™s consistent with the end user experience in other Android apps including the system settings
  # *iOS Configuration Client* uses the Cocoa preferences system (aka, the user defaults system) to provide an interface that's consistent with the user experience in other iOS apps
  # *Apps Script Configuration Client* uses a Google Apps spreadsheet based user interface
